TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create SupportByFirePositions (ControlFeature) with different directions in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates SupportByFirePositions with different directions. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the ControlFeature message schema area, for instance Ground Picture > Battlespace Geometry. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created SupportByFirePositions are displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a SupportByFirePosition ControlFeature with vertical orientation and the two arrows in slightly different directions eastward.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the SupportByFirePosition correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a SupportByFirePosition ControlFeature with horizontal orientation and the two arrows in slightly different directions northward.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the SupportByFirePosition correctly.
